flavorText:
"The end justifies the means. What do I care if I rule over the dead rather than over the living? The dead ask fewer questions."
—Kaervek

foreignData.name: Kaerveks Trotz
foreignData.text: Opfere alle bleibenden Karten, wirf Deine Karten auf der Hand ab: Ein Spieler Deiner Wahl verliert 5 Lebenspunkte.

name: Kaervek's Spite
originalText: Sacrifice all permanents, Discard your hand: Target player loses 5 life.

rulings.text: The sacrifice of all your permanents and discarding of your hand is part of the cost and is paid on casting. You do not have a choice to pay this cost zero times or more than one time in order to multiply the effect.
As always, you can’t sacrifice things you do not control.

text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice all permanents you control and discard your hand.
Target player loses 5 life.
